clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Xiaoer Jiebiao Oral Liquid on Hand-foot-mouth Disease
clinical_study.official_title: Effect and Safety of Xiao'er Jiebiao Oral Liquid in Combination With Standard Treatment on Hand-foot-mouth Disease in Pediatric Patients

brief_summary.textblock: This is a single-blinded randomized trial aiming to evaluate the effectiveness of Xiaoer Jiebiao Oral liquid in combination with Ribavirin treatment on patients with hand-foot-mouth disease compared with the controlgroup that recieve only libavirin treatment.

primary_outcome.measure: Time (hours) taken from treatment start till body temperature dropping to normal
primary_outcome.time_frame: time length( hours) from treatment starting to the time that body temperature drop to normal 37.0 degree for 12 hours

primary_outcome.measure: Time (hours) taken from disease onset till body temperature dropping to normal
primary_outcome.time_frame: time length (hours) from the disease onset (the starting of fever) till the time that body temperature dropped to normal (37.0 degree) and lasting for at least 12 hours

primary_outcome.measure: Top body temperature at the 24th hour, 48th hour and the 72th hour from treatment starting.
primary_outcome.time_frame: from starting of treatment to the 24th hour, 48th hour, and the 72th hour
primary_outcome.description: top body temperature at 3 time points after treatment diarrhea

secondary_outcome.time_frame: from start of treatment to discharge
secondary_outcome.description: proportion of patients with digestive tract symptoms during treatment, such as vomit, abdomial pain or diarrhea

secondary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of treatment to discharge test
secondary_outcome.description: defined as 1 if any abnormal blood routine occur, otherwise defined as 0

secondary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of treatment to discharge
secondary_outcome.description: defined as 1 if any liver function examination or kidney function examination occur, otherwise defined as 0

intervention.intervention_name: Ribavirin plus Xiao'er jiebiao oral liquid
intervention.description: For mild (Phase I) patients: recommended treatment according to naitonal guildeline for treatment of mouth-foot-hand diseases 2010, including ①treatment for control symptoms ② ribavirin 15mg/kg/d（ diluted in 100ml 5%GS），qd, ivgg, in combination using of Xiaoer jiebiao oral liquid 5 ml, bid for children aged 1-2 years, tid for children aged 3-5 years. For moderate (Phase II) patients: recommended treatment according to naitonal guildeline for treatment of mouth-foot-hand diseases 2010, including ①treatment for control symptoms ② ribavirin 15mg/kg/d（ diluted in 100ml 5%GS），qd, intravenous drip, in combination using of Xiaoer jiebiao oral liquid 5 ml, bid for children aged 1-2 years, tid for children aged 3-5 years.③anti-intracranial pressure treatment: mannitol 2~5ml/kg,iv, Bid~tid）

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:subjects should meet all of the following
- diagnosed as hand-foot-mouth disease grade I or grade II;
- body temperature at admission T>38℃，fever length<48 hours;
- no need for hormonotherapy or immunoglobulin therapy.
- signed written informed consent form
Exclusion Criteria:subjects should be excluded if meet any of the following
- with history of any heart, lung, kidney or liver diseases; under any hormonotherapy, immunoglobulin therapy or any other therapy.
